name: Sari Pan Pacific Jakarta

reviews.title: Okay, but not the best
reviews.text: The hotel was average for this price range. The pool was lovely, however. Reception staff were friendly, albeit not used to seeing a tourist with a backpack, however the Irish pub was devoid of customers, staff liked to chat rather than serve. The room was average, but clean and as expected. Toiletries provided were okay, but not luxury, which is something that makes or breaks it for me. Bathroom was average. Complimentary breakfast was okay, and the helpful staff let me stay in the business lounge to watch TV after checking out time, whilst waiting for the free shuttle taxi to the airport. Overall, good for business people, or people staying for a few days in the city untill moving on.

My mom and step father recommended us to stay at Sari Pan with them as they had stayed at Sari Pan couple times before. I can certainly see why they always come back here. We all stayed at Sari Pan between 29 Dec '07 and out on 3 Jan '08 and had 3 rooms and loved it. It was my husband first time to Jakarta and he was very impressed of the great service and facilities. I am suprised how highly he talked about Jakarta and all this because Sari Pan has made good impression on him from the moment we stepped into the lobby. Our 17 months old son also had a great time running up and down the hallways and the lobby. Breakfast on the pacific floor was devine, the view was great. It was almost as if we were dreaming it all. However, room service was insanely expensive since you can get the same thing down the street for 4 times cheaper and tastier. We stayed in the Pacific room on the 17th floor and that was great because it has cooking facility, huge bathroom and a living room. I would definately recommen anyone to stay at Sari Pan Pacific for the great location. Don't look any further. Stay at Sari Pan Pacific for the great service, great facilities and the fact it's close to the shopping malls, clubs and many more... We already made plan to come back to Jakarta and stay at Sari Pan towards the end of 2009. Hopefully the service will stay the same as in 2009 we will be staying longer.
reviews.title: We will be back!!!

reviews.text: An above average hotel but definitely not a typical Pan Pacific hotel. great location too as it is close to the CBD as well as shopping malls.
reviews.title: Good location and expensive internet

reviews.text: Adequate facilities in the hotel such as gym and the pool. Rooms are well kept though they can make do with more TV channels. Several restaurants to choose from but then again with 3 malls within the vicinity, there are definitely plenty of choices.
reviews.title: Average 5 star hotel

reviews.text: Good business hotel as they provide free shuttle service in taxi to airport at scheduled timings.
reviews.title: Smelly bathroom

reviews.text: Stayed here between 6 - 10 September 2006. The rooms were quite comfortable and clean but the furniture and the carpet needs to be replaced as it is worn out. The hotel is located on the busy Thamrin Road but just avoid the peak hours you should be fine. It is adjacent to a small shopping mall, where you could find some shops to browse around.
reviews.title: Average

reviews.text: The staff there are friendly and attentive but due to high number of occupancy the lobby is always full of people. Unfortunately, the swimming pool is small and there is no children pool so everyone cramps up in the same pool.
reviews.title: Dirty, worn-out and - for Jarkarta - expensive
Wouldn't go here again
reviews.text: I booked a room for three nights via the hotel site which was US 95 per night, on arrival I saw the room which was very small and dirty - there was a large stain on the bed headboard and stains on the carpet. I went back to the reception and asked for a better and larger room and offered to pay more, I was given a Pacific room at US 125 per night, the room was big but very grubby - lots of stains on the carpet and furniture. I had use of the exec lounge on the top floor but as you could not ware shorts up there so didn’t go. The whole hotel is in desperate need of a major refit/refurbishment the public areas and corridors are very run down, the exterior of the building looks like it was designed by a butcher not an architect.

aka: Sari Pan Pacific Jakarta Hotel Jakarta
description: Located right in the heart of Jakarta's prestigious commercial shopping, dining and entertainment districts, Sari Pan Pacific Jakarta Hotel is the perfect choice for your stay in Jakarta. Just 35 minutes away from Jakarta's Soekarno Hatta International Airport, it is also close to Jalan Thamrin, the most famous Boulevard in Central Jakarta. Most airline offices, major business offices, several embassies and a leading department store are just a few minutes walk away from the hotel. The Sari Pan Pacific Jakarta Hotel has won the Adikarya Wisata Award three times for exceeding hospitality achievement and dedication to support tourist development. Above all, here at Jakarta’s preferred business address, we seek to provide five-star service, always.
